column5: Water views from angled balcony, 2 min walk down to the beach! No need to drive!! Beach condo has 1 bdrm, 1 bath, sleeps 4, fully furnished approx. 420 sq ft. with queen bed and queen size sofa sleeper. Has stainless steel appliances, kitchenette, all amenities! Gated condominium (card pass issued for private entry/exit into condominium premise from the beach) condo has on site night security and private key access to beach/pools. 2 pools on site (1 heated ).
column8: Beautifully furnished beach condo! Water views!
